channel.title: Portfolios on Shining Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Shining Studio

item.title: Poster Design: Silk Road (2018)
item.description: To enter a UK poster design competition “Echoes of the Silk Road”, I tried several ideas.

item.title: Holiday Pictures from South France (2018)
item.description: I drew these when I was in Portiragnes Plage (France).

item.title: Chinese Painting: Bamboo (2018)
item.description: I have learned to paint bamboos since November 2017.

item.title: Chinese Laterns (2018)
item.description: I have made Chinese lanterns and also taught the children at my Chinese school how to make it.

item.title: Year of Dog (2018)
item.description: It is year of dog since Feb 2018!

item.title: Chinese Paper-Cutting (2018)
item.description: I have done paper-cutting to celebrate Chinese New Year.

item.title: Enamel painting (2017)
item.description: I tried Enamel Painting in Hangzhou, China.

item.title: Speed Drawing (2017)
item.description: iPhone has a feature called “time-lapse” which you can use to do speed drawing.

item.title: Pokemon Amigurumi (2016 - 2017)
item.description: From August 2016 to March 2017, I have crocheted many Pokemons, including whole series of eeveelutions, Chikorita baby kit for my mum’s friend, Pikachu as a gift for a little boy’s birthday.

item.title: Tonal Shoe (2016)
item.description: This is my art homework.

item.title: Super Shoe Design (2016)
item.description: I designed this super shoe at school!

item.title: Dress Making (2014 - 2016)
item.description: My mum bought me a sewing machine as a Christmas present in 2013. Since then I have made several dresses for my sister and myself.

item.title: Half and Half Pictures (2016)
item.description: At school, we had to do a half and half picture (half drawing, half photo).

item.title: Quilling (2015)
item.description: Quilling is when you create shapes and pictures using paper strips like these that I made:

item.title: Skate Cake (2015)
item.description: For my ten-year-old birthday party, I decorated my own cake.

item.title: Illuminated Letters (2014 -2016)
item.description: In school, we learned about William Morris and I started making my own illuminated letter.

item.title: Resin Charms (2014)
item.description: I went on holiday to Cornwall, and I made resin charms with my sister.

item.title: Jewelry Making (2014)
item.description: I make jewelry using materials that I brought from China when I had holiday there.

item.title: E-card for Christmas and New Year (2013)
item.description: I drew Christmas and New Year cards on iPad so that I can send e-card to friends!!!

item.title: Chinese Painting: Panda (2018)
item.description: After the lesson of “Panda painting”, I drew some Pandas.

item.title: My Three Fish (2018)
item.description: Here are the three fish I painted. (Chinese painting, Watercolour and Acrylic in that order).

item.title: Embroidery (2014)
item.description: I learnt embroidery from my grandma.

item.title: Water Color Painting: Horse (2013)
item.description: After one horse riding, I drew a water colour painting using cotton buds!
